name: Western Governors University special fund
text: There is established a Western Governors University special fund into which shall be deposited all revenues derived from the State's participation in the Western Governors University, except University of Hawaii income from tuition and fees charged for regular courses of instruction and tuition-related course and fee charges to students.  The fund shall be administered by the board of regents of the University of Hawaii and shall be used for the State's membership and participation in the Western Governors University. [L 2006, c 75, pt of §2]
